text: yud'dham vilakkiya masannalil marram varuttunnat katutta ‎satyanisedhaman. atuvali a satyanisedhikal kututal valiya ‎valiketilakappetunnu. cila keallannalilavar yud'dham anuvadaniyamakkunnu. ‎marrucila varsnnalilat nisid'dhamakkukayum ceyyunnu. allahu ‎nisid'dhamakkiya masannalute ennam oppikkananit. annane allahu ‎vilakkiyatine avar anuvadaniyamakkunnu. avarute i ‎dusceytikal avarkk akarsikamayi teannunnu. satyanisedhikalaya ‎janatte allahu nerva liyilakkukayilla. ‎
